review_reason: RecursiveSeed.lean has ~100 pre-existing build errors from API compatibility issues. The file has not built successfully for multiple commits. Build must be fixed before Phase 2/3 work can proceed.
summary: Discovered RecursiveSeed.lean has ~100 pre-existing build errors from library API changes. Partial fixes applied (omega goals, classification lemmas, assumption parameter order) but significant work remains. Build errors block all further progress on Phase 2 termination proof or Phase 3 consistency.

artifacts.summary: Partial fixes for API compatibility: omega goals (simp only), classification lemmas (contradiction), assumption order

partial_progress.details: RecursiveSeed.lean has ~100 pre-existing build errors from library API changes. Partial fixes applied but build still fails. Cannot proceed with Phase 2 termination proof or Phase 3 consistency until build is restored.
partial_progress.blocker: Pre-existing build errors: List.getElem?_mem renamed, simp patterns changed, hasPosition unfold failures, etc.
